name: Sonic Construction V1.0
description:
Introducing Sonic Construction - The newest Sonic Level Editing Software where you can build the Sonic levels of your dreams!

Sonic Construction is a Sonic fangame built by EchoNotGecko and XStables. You can build, save, and share you sonic levels using this software. With lots of features, whacky gimmicks, and fun platforming ideas, this is sure to be the most greatest online sonic making software!

Want to share your level with the community? Visit https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/443299/!

---- Instructions ----

MENU

Arrow Keys - Select

Space - Confirm

EDITOR

A or S - switch tiles/objects

Z or X - rotate tiles/objects

Robotnik Monitor - Clear Level

Blue Sphere (Red Sphere) - Enter Test Mode (Enter Edit Mode)

Green 1/Cyan 2 Button - Toggle between Layers 1 and 2

Save Buttons - Save and Load levels

Sonic Construction is in active development, and will be receiving lots of updates here and there! More features will soon arrive for even more creativity!
